high_descs: Turn left and go to the shelf.
Turn around and walk to the toilet
Put the sponge on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put the sponge on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Go straight, then turn left at the metal shelf.
Take the sponge from the shelf.
Turn right, then turn right, then go straight, to the toilet.
Place the sponge on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a sponge on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Walk to the steel rack to the right of the sink.
Pick up the sponge from the steel rack.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the sponge on the top of the toilet, just to the right of the toilet paper.
anns.task_desc: Place a sponge on the top of a toilet.
